description:
The Shifter II Long Sleeve Hoodie is a super-comfortable pullover featuring icebreaker's Eucaform terry fabric—a soft and breathable blend of natural merino wool and plant-based TENCEL™ Lyocell. Perfect for after a big day outside or for chill weekends around town, this classic hoodie also features a kangaroo patch pocket as well as ribbed cuffs and bottom hem.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fibre that naturally resists odours, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Merino Shifter II LS Hoodie - Mens

specs.value: 98% Merino Wool, 2% Elastane - Exclusive Of Decoration
